subtitleNullable: Collection of Anime Images with annotated faces

### Context

This dataset contains 6640 anime images crawled from pixiv top 100 daily rankings. The author of the dataset used [nagadomi's face detector for anime/manga using OpenCV](https://github.com/nagadomi/lbpcascade_animeface).

The original dataset was converted into YOLOv5 PyTorch TXT Annotation Format and split into 80/10/10 on train, test and valid using [roboflow](app.roboflow.com). 


### Acknowledgements

Original dataset by [qhgz2013](https://github.com/qhgz2013/anime-face-detector)


### Inspiration

Your data will be in front of the world's largest data science community. What questions do you want to see answered?
